alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 10:32PM CDT until June 01 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ARCHER AND SOUTHEASTERN BAYLOR COUNTIES... At 1031 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Megargel, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Broadcast media reported ping pong size hail southeast of Westover. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Megargel and Westover. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
